# provisioners jobs

View and manage provisioner jobs

Aliases:

- job

## Usage

```console
coder provisioners jobs
```

## Subcommands

| Name                                                 | Purpose                  |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------ |
| [<code>list</code>](./provisioners_jobs_list.md)     | List provisioner jobs    |
| [<code>cancel</code>](./provisioners_jobs_cancel.md) | Cancel a provisioner job |
